ygData.subject: Re: Staff of the Wheel
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, since many think the combining of the rods has to do with research, I went ahead and borrowed a bunch of Wisdom items from a friend (since this commonly
ygData.messageBody:
Well, since many think the combining of the rods has to do with research, I went
ahead and borrowed a bunch of Wisdom items from a friend (since this commonly
helps against failures for trade skills). I also got a wisdom buff from a high
level Enchanter friend.

I succeeded the first try and got the staff! Not sure if wisdom had anything to
do with it, but I guess it didn't hurt. :)

Soren


Alan Charity wrote:

> From: "Alan Charity" <acharity@...>
>
> I have started my quest for the Staff of the Wheel and currently have 8 of
> the 10 rods.
>
> I am missing the one in Guk and the one from the Everfrost caves. But I have
> a few questions since I have spent no time in Guk in 32 levels.
>
> GUK
> 1. I need to know the easiest or quickest path to the hand room?
>
> 2. Is the room on the Live or Dead side?
>
> 3. Will I encounter any Undead frogs along the way?
>
> EVERFROST
> I know that the rod is surrounded by 3 IBS and that an NPC is in the area. I
> can get by the IBS with Invis to Undead but the NPC could be a problem.
>
> 1. Is this NPC within range of the rod?
>
> I will not have a group with me and am only going to attempt this when the
> Hand room is being camped. I may however try a suicide run depending on how
> brave I feel.
>
> Aljernon
> 32nd Level Wizard
>
>
